languages.text: "Почтенный Леттард был бы благодарен за подобную оценку. Он был практик, человек логики".
"The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."
languages.original_text: "Почтенный Леттард был бы благодарен за подобную оценку. Он был практик, человек логики".

traits.locale_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."
"Thank you. I am a practical and logical person."
"Thank you. I am a man of logic and practicality."
"Thank you. I am a man of logic and practicality."
"The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."
"The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."
"The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."

languages.text: « L'honorable Lettard serait satisfait de ce verdict. Il a toujours été quelqu'un de logique et de pragmatique. »
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."

traits.locale_text: « L'honorable Lettard serait satisfait de ce verdict. Il a toujours été quelqu'un de logique et de pragmatique. »

languages.text: «El venerable Lettard agradecería que se celebrara este juicio. Era un hombre lógico y práctico».
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."

traits.locale_text: «El venerable Lettard agradecería que se celebrara este juicio. Era un hombre lógico y práctico».

languages.text: 「名誉あるレタードは、この判決を喜ぶことでしょう。彼は論理的かつ現実的な人間でしたからね」
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."

traits.locale_text: 「名誉あるレタードは、この判決を喜ぶことでしょう。彼は論理的かつ現実的な人間でしたからね」

languages.text: “尊敬的莱塔德一定会对这样的判决结果心怀感激，他是个讲究逻辑与实用价值的人。”
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的莱塔德一定会对这样的判决结果心怀感激，他是个讲究逻辑与实用价值的人。”

languages.text: Der geschätzte Lettard wäre für dieses Urteil dankbar. Er war ein Mann der Logik und Praktikabilität.
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."

traits.locale_text: Der geschätzte Lettard wäre für dieses Urteil dankbar. Er war ein Mann der Logik und Praktikabilität.

languages.text: "Muhterem Lettard, bu hükümden minnettar olurdu. Kendisi mantıklı ve gerçekçi bir adamdı."
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Lettard would be grateful for this judgement. He was a man of logic and practicality."
